title: GoPro: New Mounts
description:
New mounts and accessories deliver innovative new ways to capture your favorite  moments. Mount your GoPro to handlebars, seat posts, ski poles and more. Different sized mounting locations, or secures to a pipe or pole to create a handheld boom. 

As always, happy capturing!

You might see examples of extreme use in this video. Please take appropriate precautions to ensure your own safety and the safety of those around you, and to protect your GoPro camera.
